title: Do they still sell 3D televisions? - Quora

response.answer_text: There no major TV-makers that make 3D TVs anymore. The last two TV-makers to build 3D functionality into their sets, LG and Sony, will not build any new sets this year that can show 3D movies and TV shows. DirecTV and ESPN stopped broadcasting their 3D channels in 2012 and 2013. For those that desire to purchase a 3D TV or 3D Video projector – you may still find some 3D TVs on clearance or on resale sites, and most home theater video projectors still provide the 3D viewing option.

No. Only on ebay. They never took off because the angle necessary to view the screen was too unforgiving, the glasses were too expensive and a hassle, etc. Programs that had been planned to be broadcast in 3d weren't, because the audience was too small.
